attributes.action: KEEP the train service from Stranraer to Ayr running.
attributes.additional_details: A bus service has been put into place instead of the train. A bus from stranraer to Ayr takes over 2 hours, there is no toilet facilities and buses are becoming overcrowded making the journey uncomfortable. There has been talk of them discontinuing the train service all together.
attributes.background: The service from stranraer to ayr has been suspended untill further notice. Leaving commuters finding it impossible to travel to work ,college and to do shopping.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
